Text: The Queen's Body Guard of the Yeomen of the Guard are a bodyguard of the British Monarch.

Text: Yeomen of the Guard:  There are 60 Yeomen of the Guard (plus six officers), drawn from retired members of the British Army, Royal Marines and Royal Air Force, but traditionally not the Royal Navy.
